name: Straight Outta Control
description:
Help the 'l' from the control key in its quest ! 

Meet weird characters (literally), think with puzzles and hear the incredible voice acting, made by one completely non-professional voice actor !

This was made in 48h for the GMTK 2020 jam, and following the same rules as the compo jam of the ludum dare (no premade assets except fonts and everything made by one person), so this explains the quality of the sounds, art and voice acting X)

Also, this was made in plain old dirty javascript, so if you want, you can take a look at the code, but it is really dirty in some place (but yeah, in 48h I prefer to get things done instead of having a clean code ^^ )

Anyway, have fun !
